mdMethod.name: confirmDeleteEntity
mdMethod.label: Confirm Delete Entity
mdMethod.description: Throws exception with confirmation information to delete an entity with more than one parent.

mdParameter.name: parentId
mdParameter.label: Parent Id
mdParameter.description: The id of the current GeoEntity parent.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.DuplicateParentException
mdException.label: Duplicate Parent Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a child GeoEntity is added to the same parent twice

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.ConfirmDeleteEntityException
mdException.label: Confirm delete entity exception
mdException.description: Exception thrown when deleting an entity with more than one parent.
